@Guns.AreYouSurePart1: Are you sure you want to delete this gun? Operation cannot be undone!
@Guns.RegisterFirst: But it is the best time to start, you're lucky!
@Guns.TooManyGuns: There are only 7 guns could be registered, sorry.
@Guns.ToChangePart1: To change the picture please use "Photo upload"
@Guns.confirmRemovePhoto: Are you sure you want to remove this photo? Operation cannot be undone!
@Guns.ImageIsReady: Now image is ready to be uploaded to the cloud. Use "Upload" button below to complete.
@Guns.CurrentPhoto: This is current photo. Only one photo could be uploaded for a gun, so if you upload another photo - this one will be replaced.
@Guns.UseSquare: Try to use square images - we will round them to circle, so better to put the valuable content to the center.

@User.ChangePasswordDone: Password updated. Now you can login with these credentials.
@User.LogoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?
@User.ResetPasswordLine1: You need to request the reset code first. We will send it to the email provided.
@User.ResetPasswordLine2: Then you need to enter the code sent, and new password.
@User.EnterCode: 2. Enter the code and new password
@User.resetCodeSent: Reset code was send to the email provided.
@User.passwordUpdated: Password updated. Now you can login with these credentials.
@User.SignOutMessage: You will be redirected to Home page in a moment...
@User.SignUpLine1: To be registered you need to provide valid e-mail address you have access to, and the credentials.
@User.SignUpLine2: Then we will send you a verification code you need to use within 15 minutes to confirm the email.
@User.SignUpFillForm: 1. Please fill the form to register:
@User.registrationCodeSent: Successful registration. Verification code was send to email provided.
@User.registrationDone: Successful registration. Now you can login with these credentials.
